column4: I love ubuntu but I have no ideas of its business plan do any of you do?
When to start making profits, they're going to invest them in a dairy herd and start a cheese farm.
, gm78: I really wonder what they want to make money of.... HP now supports Ubuntu as I gathered from slashdot. But they unlike RH offer servers versions for free.
The aim of Ubuntu isn't to have 20,000,000 little kids using it to get the stats up.
